channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache APISIX

item.title: CVE-2024-32638|2024-05-02T09:20:29.127Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache APISIX
item.description:
Inconsistent Interpretation of HTTP Requests ('HTTP Request Smuggling')Â vulnerability in Apache APISIX when using `forward-auth` plugin.This issue affects Apache APISIX: from 3.8.0, 3.9.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 3.8.1, 3.9.1 or higher, which fixes the issue.
